questionTitle: She <u><font color='red'>got</font></u> the job <u><font color='red'>like</font></u> a model <u><font color='red'>because of</font></u> her good <u><font color='red'>looks</font></u>.

You<u><font color='red'>'d better</font></u> <u><font color='red'>cut down on</font></u> your intake of sugar <u><font color='red'>to avoid</font></u> problems <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> your teeth.

It <u><font color='red'>was said</font></u> that the world <u><font color='red'>will be suffering</font></u> from an <u><font color='red'>energy crisis</font></u> <u><font color='red'>by the 2010s</font></u>.
Her husband treated her badly. I'm surprised she ________ it for so long.
The bank manager ________ me to open a deposit account as soon as possible.
Oxfam tries to send food to countries where people are suffering ________ malnutrition.
If students are to understand the notice, the instructions must be ________ clearer.
________ you like what I want to do or not, you won't make me change my mind .
Doctors usually have to study for at least seven years before becoming fully ________.
The weather was warm and pleasant with ________ a gentle wind to cool us down.
I wish you wouldn't ________ your clothes all over the floor.
________ he had no money for a bus, he had to walk all the way home.
He didn't want to make up his mind until he had heard Pamela's ________ of the story.
It is strange that Lucy is as ________ as her mother is beautiful.
Since the accident he has walked with a ________.
We flew to the island, then ________ a car for three days and visited most places of interest.
In America, surgeons have given a man a(n) ________ heart.
The examiners had to ________ half the candidates.
The company made a record ________ last year.
We must economize ________ fuel.
When he finally understood what she was saying, everything ________.
I had to give a full ________ of my camera when I reported it stolen.
Jim's version of the facts doesn't ________ with the version I heard from Jules.
